title: Photograph, View of the main altar and chancel in an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of the main altar and chancel in an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: View looking down the center aisle to the main altar. High pointed arch over it, with tracery, and a painting of Christ below, at either side. Altar with a reredos of gablets and turrets with finials. Complicated wooden arcade with much tracery, running around the chancel.

Same church as 1961-83-14 & -15.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View of the main altar and chancel in an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-13
